Extrude the 2D sketch to generate the 3D model with the following properties: - extrude_depth_towards_normal: 0.0679 - extrude_depth_opposite_normal: 0.0 - sketch_scale: 0.7469 This operation results in the creation of a new solid body. Scale the 2D sketch by a factor of 0.7442. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into 3D Sketch using the euler angles and translation vector from the coordinate system. Extrude the 2D sketch to generate the 3D model with the following properties: - extrude_depth_towards_normal: 0.5432 - extrude_depth_opposite_normal: 0.0 - sketch_scale: 0.7442 This operation involves joining materials to the existing body. The final dimensions of part_2 are: - length: 0.7442 - width: 0.7442 - height: 0.5432</description>
